articles.title: Watch Joni Mitchell sing in public for the first time since 2013 - NME
articles.description: Joni Mitchell has delivered her first public performance in nine years, taking to the stage at MusiCares’ 2022 Person Of The Year gala.
articles.content:
Joni Mitchell has delivered her first public performance in nine years, taking to the stage at MusiCares 2022 Person of the Year benefit gala.

articles.title: Watch Chris Stapleton Destroy the Grammy Audience With ‘Cold’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: The country singer growled his way through the Best Country Song winner and plucked out an electrifying guitar solo
articles.content:
Chris Stapleton performed his Grammy-winning song “Cold” at the 2022 ceremonies in Las Vegas, earning a standing ovation in the process.
